privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy describes how personal information you provide through the contact form is collected, used, and protected.

dataCollection.title: Data collection
dataCollection.content: We only collect information you voluntarily provide through the contact form: name, email, subject, and message.

dataUsage.title: Data usage
dataUsage.content: The collected information is used exclusively to respond to your inquiry or request. We do not share your information with third parties.

dataProtection.title: Data protection

rights.content: You have the right to access, rectify, or delete your personal data at any time by contacting me directly.
